title: Where to buy Indie Fonts?
content:
Considering I live in Belgium, Western Europe, from whom   
would it be the most sensible to purchase my copy of the   
Indie Fonts catalogue? What's the closest?

 [‹ Type news on the Flash front.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091626/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1034 "Go to previous forum topic") [Arabic in InDesign ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102091626/http:/www.typophile.com/node/1005 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content:
Found these when I was looking for Indie Fonts **2** :   
   
Nijhof & Lee:   
35 euro   
service 2.5 euro   
post 8.5 euro (7-10 days)   
   
   
Underware:   
35.5 euro   
7 euro std delivery   
or   
10 euro priority   
   
(Their post charges were for 'Europe')
